title: PWA - African based NGO
description: Poverty Watch Africa is a multi-dimensional problem that can not be solved by aid but rather requires a a successful implementation of strategies that can bridge the gap between African development objectives and the general well being and aspiration of the population.

title: ReachAfrika - An oline payment service
description: Make all payments with convenience. From utility bills, Airtime and Internet Top-up, to TV subscriptions. You can do all this and more on ReachAfrika.

title: ForceFields Ghana Ltd - Workforce Management Compony
description: A company Based in Tarkwa (In the Western Region of Ghana, Forcefields Ghana Limited is a Workforce Management, Labour Hire and Outsourced Employment Solutions Provider offering Temporary Labour Hire and Recruitment Solutions across Construction, Mining Resources and Energy.

title: Gh-Top - Community based sharing site
description: Developed to help foreigners (students) find he best schools, accommodations, hospitals & restaurant in Ghana. This is a demo, login & registration not working.

title: HMS - Simple hostel management system
description: This is a personal project that was intented for the management of the hostel in which I was leaving, unfortunately it was close. The project will be soon made public on Github

title: G Dark - A Visual Studio Code theme
description: A personal theme for visual studio code designed to improve code readbility.
